name: 28-DayFlashBriefingBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Top tips and tricks to help you produce and present a bigger and better Briefing. 

Together we will go through step-by-step what you need to know to have impact: the skillset, your mindset and your marketing.

You will get more listeners and they will be more engaged.

Each day's we look at another aspect of the coursework, each one is available for one day only until the cycle starts again on the first of the following month. Each day's content is constantly updated.

Hosted by BBC presenter, producer Peter Stewart, the 28-Day Flash Briefing Briefing teaches you how to grow your Briefing, better connect with listeners, and spread your message.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
